content:
Servicemen of the 79th Separate Airborne Taurian Brigade showed enemy equipment in the Novomikhailivka area in Donetsk region.

VideoShe spreadThe press service of the commanding assault troops.

“The invaders are pushing with great forces, but they break their teeth on the powerful defense of Tavriya paratroopers in the Novomikhailivka area. These spectacular footage has everything that all Ukrainians like: Russian equipment burns and explodes, enemy infantry fusses and dies, ”the video said.

“It works 79! And so it will be with everyone who will come to our land with weapons, ”the KDShv was summarized.

As reported by the Armyinform,The other day paratroopers of the 79th Separate Airborne Outstone Brigadedestroyed 3 tanks and 4 battle armored vehiclesoccupants.
title: The paratroopers of the Tavriya brigade showed spectacular destruction of Russians near Novomikhailivka
description: The video was disseminated by the press service of the commanding assault troops. “The invaders are pouring ...
author: Army Inform
